评论概述: Nice, but not what i expected
评论详情: Just arrived today - here’s my first impression…nice size, cute design, thought it was smooth leather but it is pebbly texture, i ordered light grey and it is closer to off-white or khaki (more tan/yellowish tones). The color is the most questionable for me - i have another bag this color and while it is “neutral”, it was not what i expected and im not too excited about it. I will see how it looks with some outfits - it will probably work fine colorwise. Also, the insert is removable - you can keep it in to make a large flat base or take it out to have more of an envelope style. All in all, its a fun, different design at a good price!

This purse can be paired with church or causal attire. It’s a soft material with a the flexibility of open it up wide or folding it to be slim. The Yellow went will with my entire look for a Women Conference. Very elegant. Most have in your wardrobe.

I love this bag!  It’s got such an edgy look and it fits all the necessary items. And it was so cheap!!  I got the navy and I think the dark color helps it look a bit more elevated.  The square edges are a nice touch and the magnetic closure stayed put.  I wore it to a wedding and then wound up using it as my purse the rest of the weekend.  It held up fine- but I was a little aware to be gentle on the wrist opening.  It’s just a raw “leather” edge and I wondered if it would rip around the circle- so far so good, but I was trying to be careful.  All in all, it was a gamble that paid off when I was looking for something classy but out of the ordinary.

You won't be disappointed. Get all the colors!
